title: Learner Identity and Permission Management Simulation: Strengthening Social Sector Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital platforms and understanding of educational technology tools
context.additional_context: Scenario-based practical training in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments to provide learning experiences similar to real job situations

learning_goals: Through scenario-based VR simulations, learners can explain learner identity integration processes in three or more stages.
Learners can identify two or more permission management issues arising during external service integration and propose solutions.
In a simulated account creation environment, learners can practice procedures for securely handling remote learner authentication data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
